item.title: Omfg u need to look at thisthere is a REWARD!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Case 823: //Dummies! { sendMessage("Attack the dummy for attack xp w00t"); addSkillXP(10000, 0); } break;

Here’s your first bit of learning!

That is a simple case. It just sends a message and adds XP. The case number is the ID of the OBJECT. The ,0 after adding the XP, is the Skill ID. 0 is attack.

Good job! Keep learning!!!

Read full topic

item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

we’ll don’t put yourself down, i thought i could never be as good as a coder as my buddy(won’t say his name) and eventually ended up doing stuff he couldn’t even try like making handlers very simply. Just brainstorm idea’s that you want on your server, and ask people here. Like let say you want, hmmmm training on dummies, just ask here and we can answer most of the questions. just don’t spam.

^^^^
These are great words of wisdom. Take them in
